versions.title: Add Side Menu and Pages
versions.overview: Add a side menu to support navigation for upcoming pages and features. Introduce new placeholder pages where content will be added later.

changes.text: Added a side navigation menu with About Me, Settings, Updates, and Contact buttons.
Added Coming Soon pages for About Me, Settings, Updates, and Contact.

versions.title: Removed negative subtraction results
versions.overview: Subtraction no longer generates negative answers.

changes.text: Subtraction now clamps to non-negative results.
